A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hard to understand the decisions Rian Johnson took for key characters such as Luke and Leia\, as it ruined what should have been spectacular conclusions to their stories and instead made them both seem feeble and unimportant. The way the First Order is shown as bumbling fools instead of scary and efficient antagonists also does the story no favors. Overall\, a very disappointing movie in so many ways for the hard core fan\, especially considering how much high praise this director was given leading up to this release.
